headline: Logan Federico's death on Cypress Street in Columbia now a homicide
description: Chief Skip Holbrook confirms 22-year-old Logan Federico was killed at a home on Cypress Street in Columbia early Saturday morning.

headline: 'That day, I could not be her hero': Father says after daughter is fatally shot in South Carolina
description: National coverage of Logan Federico's murder and Stephen Federico's emotional account of losing his daughter.

headline: North Carolina college student killed in random shooting at Columbia home after break-in, police say
description: A 22-year-old college student from North Carolina was killed after a man broke into a house on Cypress Street and shot her in the chest.

headline: Extended interview with father of NC woman found dead in Columbia
description: Logan's father, Stephen Federico, speaks exclusively with WIS News 10 about his daughter and the tragedy.

headline: Waxhaw father speaks after his daughter's murder suspect appears in court
description: Stephen Federico speaks after Alexander Dickey's first court appearance in Logan's murder case.

headline: Remembering Logan Federico
description: Over 200 people gather wearing pink to honor Logan's memory at memorial service at Cedar Creek Ranch in Waxhaw, NC.

headline: Horrific Error Kept Her Murderer Free: Getting Justice for Logan Federico
description: Fox News reporter Danamarie Nicholl breaks down criminal justice system failures including fingerprint errors that allowed Dickey to walk free.

headline: Emotional, tense moments during House Judiciary Subcommittee hearing in Charlotte on violent crime
description: Fighting back tears, Stephen Federico testifies before House Judiciary Subcommittee about Logan's murder and repeat offender failures.

headline: Grieving North Carolina father torches soft-on-crime policies during congressional hearing
description: Stephen Federico testifies that Logan's alleged murderer had 25 felonies before breaking into a Columbia house and killing his daughter.

headline: Father demands action after daughter killed by repeat offender
description: "I'm not going away. My daughter isn't going away," Stephen Federico says on America's Newsroom. "Buckle up. Put your helmet on."

headline: Phil Mickelson calls out justice system after father's emotional testimony
description: LIV Golf star Phil Mickelson responds to Stephen Federico's emotional testimony, calling out the justice system.

headline: "You Pissed Off the Wrong Daddy!" - Father of College Coed Logan Federico GOES OFF on Democrats
description: Steve Federico unleashes during House Judiciary hearing: "You pissed off the wrong daddy!"

headline: WATCH: Grieving Father's Powerful House Testimony After Career Criminal Killed His Daughter
description: Stephen Federico delivers powerful testimony to House representatives gathered in Charlotte about soft-on-crime policies.

headline: Father of Slain Daughter Torches Soft-on-Crime Policies in Heartbreaking House Testimony
description: Father of 22-year-old Logan Federico testifies before House Judiciary subcommittee about repeat offender crisis.

headline: Logan Federico: What Happened to the Murdered College Student?
description: Comprehensive case summary of Logan Federico's murder and Alexander Dickey's arrest.

headline: US Rep. Ralph Norman calls for SC solicitor to be impeached over Logan Federico case
description: Ralph Norman, running for governor, calls for Byron Gipson's impeachment over "neglect of duty" in Logan's case.

headline: 'You Woke Up A Beast': Logan Federico's Father Confronts Congress Over Repeat-Offender Failures
description: Stephen Federico sits before U.S. House Judiciary subcommittee with framed photo of his 22-year-old daughter.

headline: SC attorney general urges death penalty for Logan Federico murder
description: Attorney General Alan Wilson pressures Fifth Circuit Solicitor Byron Gipson to seek death penalty against Alexander Dickey.

headline: SC AG wants death penalty for suspect in Logan Federico case, assigns senior attorney to assist
description: Attorney General Alan Wilson assigns senior attorney Melody Brown to assist prosecution seeking death penalty.

headline: Father of slain 22-year-old wants federal prosecutors to handle daughter's murder case
description: Stephen Federico wants federal prosecutors to handle case after state court system failures contributed to Logan's killing.

headline: SC officials defend prosecution of Logan Federico's killer
description: South Carolina law enforcement officials urge patience after Stephen Federico criticizes prosecution handling.

headline: Enraged Father of Slain Woman Makes the Case for Keeping Repeat Criminals Behind Bars
description: Federico's testimony highlights why repeat offenders end up back on the streets after being given countless chances.

headline: Logan Federico murder: Suspect Alexander Dickey had 40 charges before killing
description: Investigation reveals Alexander Dickey's extensive criminal history: 39 arrests and 25 felonies before Logan's murder.

headline: Grieving dad pushes for Logan's Law after repeat offender kills daughter
description: Grieving father's testimony spotlights justice system that repeatedly frees dangerous repeat offenders until it's too late.

headline: SC lawyer legislators who vet judges criticized over Federico case - who are they?
description: Fox News' Jesse Watters examines South Carolina's judicial system and legislative oversight in light of Federico case.

headline: Congresswoman Nancy Mace Urges DOJ To Intervene In Logan Federico Murder Case
description: Congresswoman Nancy Mace calls on U.S. Department of Justice to intervene and prosecute Alexander Dickey federally.

headline: Logan Federico Murder: S.C. Attorney General, Solicitor Clash Over Death Penalty
description: Public dispute between Attorney General Alan Wilson and Fifth Circuit Solicitor Byron Gipson over prosecution strategy.

headline: Remembering the True Victims of Injustice: Iryna, Logan, the Oltons
description: Analysis of House Judiciary Subcommittee hearings featuring Stephen Federico's testimony about justice system failures.

headline: Dad Fights Back: Coed Found in Pool of Blood - Crime Stories with Nancy Grace
description: Nancy Grace covers Logan Federico case details and Stephen Federico's congressional testimony on repeat offender policies.
